summary: Muslim hackers attacked this morning (Sunday) the Israeli website "Karmei Hesed:, a charity which obtains and distributes second-hand appliances and furniture to needy families. Speaking with Arutz Sheva, the charity's director, Leo Weingarten, stated that it was the first time the organization ever had had to cope with this kind of situation. Appearing all over the site's homepage Muslim threats were threatened alongside Yemen's flag. "We demand the return of Palestine," alongside "Allah is the one god", as well as "We will kill everything Jews love", and "All of you will die", covered the main page of the organization which is dedicated to helping the less fortunate.
